title: 默认权限组没有默认权限
author: yaoyueshen
txt_content:
本帖最后由 yaoyueshen 于 2020-1-23 09:59 编辑 

加有多世界，权限组和ess，res
挖不了任何东西，手上拿着的丢不出去，也用不了
是啥问题？

replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Se、六神
replies.txt_content:
Default组在后面开启
info:
      build: true
-------------------------------
Builder组开启

  Builder:
    default: true

replies.author: yaoyueshen
replies.txt_content:
Se、六神 发表于 2020-1-23 10:04
Default组在后面开启
info:
      build: true
请问在哪里开启？

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 小张up
replies.txt_content: 你输入/list，看看玩家在哪个组。然后我再来解答

replies.author: yaoyueshen
replies.txt_content:
世予予 发表于 2020-1-23 10:16
什么权限组插件 
如果是GroupManager的话
请在plugins/GroupManager/group/group.yml中
我不加插件也是这样

不加插件的时候啥没显示，加了ess以后显示你没有权限

replies.author: yaoyueshen
replies.txt_content:
2259836694 发表于 2020-1-23 10:32
基础权限没给
1.打开插件列表的GroupManager
2.打开worlds文件
不行耶

replies.author: Levi_Marvin
replies.txt_content:
输入命令：/mangaddp default essentials.spawn,essentials.spawn.*,essentials.back,essentials.back.*,essentials.home,essentials.home.*,essentials.sethome,essentials.sethome.*,essentials.tpa,essentials.tpa.*,essentials.tpaccept,essentials.tpaccept.*,essentials.tpahere,essentials.tpahere.*,essentials.warp,essentials.warp.*,essentials.warps.*,residence.select,residence.create,residence.delete,residence.delete.subzone,residence.rename,residence.create.subzone,residence.expand,residence.expand.subzone,residence.contract,residence.contract.subzone,residence.resize
/mangaddp builder essentials.spawn,essentials.spawn.*,essentials.back,essentials.back.*,essentials.home,essentials.home.*,essentials.sethome,essentials.sethome.*,essentials.tpa,essentials.tpa.*,essentials.tpaccept,essentials.tpaccept.*,essentials.tpahere,essentials.tpahere.*,essentials.warp,essentials.warp.*,essentials.warps.*,residence.select,residence.create,residence.delete,residence.delete.subzone,residence.rename,residence.create.subzone,residence.expand,residence.expand.subzone,residence.contract,residence.contract.subzone,residence.resize
这是本人辛辛苦苦收集的权限，希望大家不要抄袭。同时也希望楼主采纳。
